```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
uganda <- scan("uganda.sfs")
barplot(uganda[2:21])
```
```{r}
ghana <- scan("ghana.sfs")
barplot(ghana[2:9])
```

